Package mahjongCIS350

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • mahjongCIS350.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all pieces and rule functionality for the game Mahjong. It is displayed by the Board and GUI classes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Remove all the Tiles from all hands and regenerate the game.

      • increaseScore

        public void increaseScore​(int plIndex,
                          boolean discard)
        This method increases the score of a player based on the mode the game is set in.
        Parameters:
        plIndex - The player index who score is increased.
        discard - True if the player has won off a discard.

      • isChi

        public boolean isChi​(Player pl,
                     Tile check)
        To check if there is chi for a specific Player.
        Parameters:
        pl - The player that is being checked.
        check - the checked_Suite should belongs to the last player of the current player
        Returns:
        True if the player can claim a chi.

      • isPong

        public boolean isPong​(java.util.ArrayList<Tile> handTile,
                      Tile check)
        This method checks if there is a pong for a specific player.
        Parameters:
        handTile - The hand of the player that is being checked for a pong.
        check - The tile checked if it can be made into a pong

      • isKong

        public boolean isKong​(java.util.ArrayList<Tile> search,
                      Tile check)
        This method checks if there is a Kong in a Player's setPile or handTile. This method uses compareTile.
        Parameters:
        search - The handTile or setPile being searched through for a Kong.
        check - The Tile that is checked if it can be made into a Kong.

      • isKongDraw

        public boolean isKongDraw​(Player player)
        This methods determines if the player has drawn into a kong that can be formed using a pong in the set pile.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that is being checked.
        Returns:
        true if the player can form a kong using the set pile.

      • isMahjong

        public boolean isMahjong​(java.util.ArrayList<Tile> handTile,
                         Tile check)
        This method checks if a Player can Mahjong. It only checks what is left of the Player's hand. If there are only chi's and pong's along with 1 Tile that matches check, then the Player can Mahjong.
        Parameters:
        handTile - The Player's current hand.
        check - The Tile checked to see if it lets the Player Mahjong.

      • getChiTile

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getChiTile​(Player pl,
                                                         Tile discard)
        This method finds the tiles the player can used to claim a chi.
        Parameters:
        pl - The player that claimed the chi.
        discard - The tile that is discarded to claim the chi.
        Returns:
        AN array list of integers the chi consisting of index.

      • takeChi

        public void takeChi​(Player player,
                    int tile1,
                    int tile2)
        This method allows the player to claim a chi. Note that the index of tile2 must be higher than the index at tile 1.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who claims the chi.
        tile1 - The tile index of the first tile that is used to the chi.
        tile2 - The tile index of the second tile that is used to claim the chi.

      • takePong

        public void takePong​(Player pl,
                     Tile tile)
        This method allows a player to claim a pong.
        Parameters:
        pl - The player that is claiming the pong.
        tile - The discard tile that is being used to claim the pong.

      • takeKong

        public void takeKong​(Player pl,
                     Tile tile)
        This method allows the player to claim a kong.
        Parameters:
        pl - The player that is claiming the kong.
        tile - The tile that is being used to claim the kong.

      • takeKongDraw

        public void takeKongDraw​(Player player)
        This method allows the player to move a tile to the set pile to form a Kong
        Parameters:
        player - Player who drew into a kong.

      • draw

        public void draw​(Player pl)
        This method draws a tile from the main wall/tiles. It will then draw another tile if the original tile draw is a point tile.
        Parameters:
        pl - The current players turn.

      • discard

        public void discard​(Player player,
                    int tileIndex)
        This methods removes a tile from hand based on the player and the tile index in their hand.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that is discarding the tile.
        tileIndex - The tile index in the selected players hand.

      • isStalemate

        public boolean isStalemate()
        This method determine if the game is a stalemate.
        Returns:
        true if the game is going to result in a stalemate

      • dumbAIDraw

        public void dumbAIDraw​(Player pl)
        AI design to get rid of a tiles and draw tiles. This is basically an AI design to lose and allow the user to feel good. This method tells the AI to draw a tile.
        Parameters:
        pl - The player whose action will be determined by an AI.

      • generalAIDiscard

        public void generalAIDiscard​(Player pl)
        A general discard method that determines how an AI should choose a Tile discard based on the AI difficulty.
        Parameters:
        pl - player that is discarding

      • showWinningHand

        public void showWinningHand​(int plIndex)
        This method copies the winning player index and moves it into the discard pile. This essitenally displays the winning players hand in the discard pile.
        Parameters:
        plIndex - The winning player index.

        Parameters:
